name: AURORA - Hip Pack
description: Please visit our new website and webshop: www.aurora-collective.com --- The AURORA Hip Pack, for your riding essentials. Don't want to take your large bag with you? Don't like those too large Hip Packs? Here is the right thing for you. Our Hip Pack comes with a lot space for everything you need, but also got really flat dimensions. It stays near to your body and you don't have to worry about getting stuck somewhere. It features a large main compartment and a divider pocket. So you can keep your tools away from scratching your phone or digital camera. So take our Hip Pack, mount it to your belt and you are ready to go. It holds a lot stuff as you can see on the picture and there is also room left for a spare tube or something like that. Works perfect as a tool pouch aswell. Specs: - made from 1100d CORDURA with water repellent coating - YKK velcro closure - large main compartment - inside divider pocket - belt loops (for belts up to 5,5cm) - U-Lock holster - D-Ring for your keys Color: black with AURORA logo patch in turquoise. Size (approx. flat measurement ) : Width: 17 cm (bottom) / 21 cm (top) Height: 11 cm Depth: 3 cm (bottom) Handmade in Germany! --- FREE SHIPPING!

name: AURORA vs. KEIRIN Berlin / worldwide shipping
description: Please visit our new website and webshop: www.aurora-collective.com --- This is a very limited edition of our AURORA velcro straps. We teamed up with our friends from KEIRIN Berlin cycle store/caf√©, to provide you with your favorite Keirin colors. These velcro straps are only available for a limited time. You can get them here or at KEIRIN in Berlin. They are... - made for road and track pedals (fits most) - fit platform pedals - designed for a safe and comfortable ride - easy to adjust - made with high-quality fabrics for industrial use - 100% handcraftet in germany Color: various/black with reflective KEIRIN logo patch. For this item REGISTERED world wide shipping is included. --- We are always trying to dispatch them as soon as possible. But these are all handmade and so it might take some time to make them and send them out. Another part is the german postal service which is sometimes slower than a snail. Hope you understand.

name: AURORA 5 Panel Cap
description: Please visit our new website and webshop: www.aurora-collective.com --- Here it is, the AURORA 5 panel cap! A lot people were asking for this and I decided to not longer wait with the release. So take it as a foretaste of many other great goods dropping pretty soon. Color: Black with blue details and lining. Size: One size fits most 100% cotton --- FREE SHIPPING!
